Package org.opengrok.indexer.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.configuration.Configuration
  • public final class Configuration
extends Object
    Placeholder class for all configuration variables. Due to the multi-threaded nature of the web application, each thread will use the same instance of the configuration object for each page request. Class and methods should have package scope, but that didn't work with the XMLDecoder/XMLEncoder.

    This should be as close to a POJO as possible.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Configuration.ConfigurationException  
      static class  Configuration.RemoteSCM
      History handling types for remote SCM repositories.

      The name of the file relative to the DATA_ROOT, which should be included into the header of generated web pages.
      static String HTTP_HEADER_INCLUDE_FILE
      The name of the file relative to the DATA_ROOT, which should be included into the HTTP header of generated web pages.

      • DEFAULT_SCANNING_DEPTH

        public static final int DEFAULT_SCANNING_DEPTH
        The directory hierarchy depth to limit the scanning for repositories. E.g. if the /mercurial/ directory (relative to source root) is a repository and /mercurial/usr/closed/ is sub-repository, the latter will be discovered only if the depth is set to 3 or greater.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String EFTAR_DTAGS_NAME
